attr.title: Maddening Euphoria
attr.desc: A unique, challenging, unnecessarily colourful arcade game with randomly generated circular level design and a wall of death.
attr.inst: Purchase the game from Steam or Itch.io. For Steam version copy all game files into the assets folder. For Itch.io version you unzip the Maddening Euphoria.zip into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/725380/Maddening_Euphoria/) or [Itch.io](https://ci.itch.io/maddening-euphoria). For Steam version copy all game files into the `assets` folder. For Itch.io version you unzip the `Maddening Euphoria.zip` into the `assets` folder.
